text: Adriano Andreani (14 September 1879 - 20 October 1960) was an Italian gymnast. He competed in the men's team event at the 1908 Summer Olympics. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1879 births Category:1960 deaths Category:Italian male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of Italy Category:Gymnasts at the 1908 Summer Olympics Category:People from Ferrara
title: Adriano Andreani
